name: Corpse Worm
movement: walking and climbing speed of 30 feet
description: The Corpse Worm is a large creature with robust defenses, capable of grappling and swallowing its prey. Its bite inflicts piercing damage and can transmit a debilitating disease.
memorable: Its ability to swallow foes and inflict a disease makes the Corpse Worm a dangerous opponent in combat.
goals: Typically seeks to grapple and consume smaller creatures, incapacitating them with disease.
environment: often found in decaying or putrid environments, due to its grotesque nature.
strengths: Immunity to poison damage and ability to inflict a debilitating disease on its victims.
weaknesses: Very low intelligence and charisma, limiting its strategies.
attacks: Bite attack that deals piercing damage and grapples targets; Swallow action allows it to consume creatures, dealing ongoing acid damage.
most_powerful_ability: Swallowing a creature, rendering them blinded and restrained while dealing acid damage over time.
senses: Possesses Keen Smell, granting it advantage on Perception checks relying on smell.
skills: Has a perception score of +3, making it reasonably aware of its surroundings.
additional_information: Grapples targets with a DC 13 escape requirement.
Disease inflicted by its bite reduces hit points over time.
Regurgitates swallowed creatures if it sustains significant damage.
Can only swallow one creature at a time.
High Constitution boosts its durability in combat.
test_queries: large creature that grapples and swallows
poisonous worm monster with disease bite
creature that inflicts diseases and consumes prey
monstrous worm with strong natural armor
